dashboard.title: Performance Hub
dashboard.intelligentEstimationTooltip: This time was calculated using intelligent learning (median) based on historical data from completed services. The median is more robust than the average, not being affected by extreme values.

collaborators.tooltip: Productivity, efficiency and service quality metrics per collaborator. Includes comparison with team average, satisfaction ratings and performance indicators.

dashboard.keyWords: Key Words: What are your clients talking about?
dashboard.sentiment: Sentiment analysis of customer feedback. Bad: -1 to 0.1, Fair: 0.1 to 0.7, Good: 0.5 to 1.
dashboard.rating: Customer satisfaction rating. Bad: 0 to 2.5, Fair: 2.5 to 4, Good: 4 to 5.
dashboard.npsDescription: Net Promoter Customer Score. Excellent: 75-100, Good: 50-74, Enough: 0-40, Bad: negative value.
dashboard.origin: Origin through which the client knew the business
dashboard.daysSince: Last client attention: Green: Less than 3 months, Yellow: between 3 and 6 months, Red: more than 6 months.
dashboard.booking: Total bookings created vs bookings still pending.
dashboard.collection: Collection due to the confirmation of bookings and attentions.

tooltip.status: Product status based on stock level
tooltip.expired: Days since expiration. Green: >30 days, Yellow: 0-30 days, Red: expired
tooltip.replacement: Days until next replacement. Green: >30 days, Yellow: 0-30 days, Red: requires replacement
tooltip.stockLevel: Current stock level as percentage of maximum

nps.description: Net Promoter Customer Score. Excellent: 75-100, Good: 50-74, Enough: 0-40, Bad: negative value.

dashboard.spyDetails: See more details on the Performance Hub Section
dashboard.spySubDetails: Data of actual month, all commerces.

healthScore.title: Business Health Score
healthScore.subtitle: Overall indicator of operational, customer and financial health
healthScore.tooltip: The Health Score is a composite indicator that evaluates the overall health of your business in three dimensions: operational (efficiency and productivity), customer (satisfaction and loyalty) and financial (profitability and growth). A high score indicates a healthy and sustainable business.

tooltips.operational: Evaluates operational efficiency: average service time, staff productivity, and business responsiveness.
tooltips.customer: Measures customer satisfaction and loyalty: CSAT, NPS, return rate, and quality of customer experience.
tooltips.financial: Analyzes financial health: revenue, profitability, growth, and economic sustainability of the business.

tooltip.conversion: The conversion rate measures the percentage of bookings that are successfully confirmed. A high value indicates that customers are keeping their appointments.
tooltip.csat: CSAT (Customer Satisfaction) measures customer satisfaction on a scale of 1 to 5. This indicator shows the equivalent percentage of satisfaction.
tooltip.nps: NPS (Net Promoter Score) measures customer loyalty. It ranges from -100 to +100. Positive values indicate more promoters than detractors.

smartRecommendations.title: Smart Recommendations
smartRecommendations.tooltip: Smart recommendations based on data analysis and key metrics. These suggestions are automatically generated by analyzing patterns, trends, and improvement opportunities in your business.

tooltip.status: Client status based on days since last attention
tooltip.daysSinceAttention: Days elapsed since last attention. Green: ‚â§90 days, Yellow: 91-180 days, Red: >180 days
tooltip.daysSinceContact: Days elapsed since last contact. Green: ‚â§90 days, Yellow: 91-180 days, Red: >180 days
tooltip.viewHistory: View patient medical history and controls
tooltip.schedule: Create new booking or appointment for client

instructions.1: 1. Access to the Whatsapp of your Company
instructions.2: 2. Go to Configurations -> Devices Connected -> Connect Devices
instructions.3: 3. Scan the QR Code with your cellphone
instructions.4: 4. Wait until the sincronization ends and for the status to be 'Active'
instructions.5: 5. Click on 'Confirm Connection' to finalize and That's it!

package.noPackagesMessage: No packages found with the selected filters
package.noAttentionsOrBookings: No attentions or bookings for this package
package.confirmCancel: Cancel this package? This action cannot be undone.

tooltip.completionRate: The completion rate measures the percentage of sessions consumed relative to total sessions sold. A high value indicates that clients are completing their packages.
tooltip.attendanceRate: The attendance rate measures the percentage of bookings that were attended (inverse of no-show rate). A high value indicates good client attendance.

consent.title: LGPD Consent Management
consent.purposePlaceholder: Describe the purpose of data processing
consent.confirmRevoke: Are you sure you want to revoke this consent?

form.title: LGPD Consents
form.intro: Dear {clientName}, we need your consent for the processing of your personal data according to the General Data Protection Law (LGPD).
form.lgpdInfo: According to LGPD, you have the right to accept or reject each type of consent. Your decision will be recorded and can be modified at any time.
form.tokenExpired: The link has expired. Please request a new link.
form.successSubmessage: Your consents have been processed and saved in our system.
form.successMessage: Your responses have been recorded correctly. Thank you for your cooperation.
form.legalFooter: Your data will be processed in accordance with LGPD (Lei 13.709/2018). You can revoke your consent at any time.

widget.title: LGPD Consents
widget.willSendLinkViaWhatsapp: A link will be sent via WhatsApp
widget.blockingWarning: These consents are mandatory to continue with the attention.

admin.title: LGPD Consent Requirements Administration
admin.whatsappTemplatePlaceholder: Message to be sent via WhatsApp to the client
admin.formIntroTextPlaceholder: Text the client will see in the web form
admin.fullTermsPlaceholder: Full legal terms according to LGPD
admin.dataDescriptionPlaceholder: Detailed description of data that will be processed
admin.revocationInstructionsPlaceholder: How the client can revoke consent
admin.templateSelectorHelp: Select a predefined template to automatically fill the fields

validate.consentTypes: You must select at least one consent type
validate.methods: You must select at least one method

noRequirements.title: No Requirements Configured
noRequirements.content: No consent requirements configured for this commerce. Add one to get started.

noAccess.title: No Access
noAccess.content: You do not have permissions to access this section.

portability.title: Data Portability (LGPD)
portability.description: You can request a copy of all your personal data in a structured and commonly used format.
portability.noConsent: You need to grant consent for data export before you can download your data.
